segments.text: Hello , Zhang lin ! Fancy meeting you here !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi , Lin Tao . I have't seen you for some time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , the same as ever , thanks . What about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Pretty good , thanks . I'm going to see my uncle .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good bye then , and keep in touch .
segments.speaker: S2
